title: Alpha Client icon reward
body: Hello, I was a member of alpha client testers, I heard there is a small reward (icon) for people who were participate. The deadline was 11/15 but I still don't have it, I'm wonder if this is the bug or it still being distributed.

replies.body:
Still being distributed until the end of the month. If you don't have it by then, let us know in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

I hope that helps!
Thanks for the info! I was wondering about it too.
